title: Marvel Masterworks: The Amazing Spider-Man Vol. 6 Variant (DM Only) (Trade Paperback)
description:
Take another swing through the life of the Amazing Spider-Man! Peter Parker’s been taken to the edge, and he’s come back —
but now he faces the Kingpin! And the boss of New York City’s crime scene doesn’t just have it in for Spider-Man, he’s looking
to deep-six both Spidey and Mr.-Hugs-and-Kisses himself, J. Jonah Jameson. Will the web-slinger save the day, or will he do a
favor for all humanity and let Jonah take a well-deserved dip with the fishes? Then, it’s horror on the home front when Peter
Parker becomes the third wheel to comics’ odd couple. Yes, Aunt May’s found a new friend — in the person of Dr. Otto Octavius!
Yowza! While a klonk on the head may help Spidey forget that one, teaming up with Doc Ock isn’t going to improve his image
as public Enemy No. 1! Also featuring a rumble in the urban jungle with Ka-Zar, the return of Jolly Jonah’s Spider-Slayer, the
first appearance of Captain Stacy, plenty of go-go dancing by the gorgeous Mary Jane Watson and Gwen Stacy, and a huge
Hollywood SPIDER-MAN ANNUAL adventure with the Human Torch! You know the drill if you wants the thrills: Reserve your
copy today, True Believer! Collecting AMAZING SPIDER-MAN (1963) #51-61 and ANNUAL #4.
